function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variable and unpredictable airflow patterns in naturally ventilated buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hems features that contribute to reducing community environmental impacts during the covid-19 pandemic were particularly unpopular, indicating a potential lack of interest in sustainability-focused features.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission and infectious incubation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investment in cycling and pedestrian infrastructure may limit the effectiveness of active transport modes in meeting mobility demands during pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in government initiatives","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small infectious droplets can travel for up to 4 meters in quiet, enclosed environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of private sector models for healthcare in low-and middle-income countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Email addresses provided may be used for phishing attacks, spreading malicious software, or unauthorized access.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying among survivalists","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expansion of food collection, redistribution, and valorisation facilities may lead to an increased risk of disease transmission in these facilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-risk environment in public transport","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inter-individual physical interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential inter-species transmission of novel coronavirus in shared landscapes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suicidal ideation from economic crisis and uncertainties","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate building hygiene and wellbeing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for disadvantaged or vulnerable groups when risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on self-reported data for perceived risk of covid-19 infection and energy usage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Web scraping process using java and jsoup library","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narrow focus in disease elimination programs neglecting common vectors transmitting multiple diseases in the same communities , global programme to eliminate lymphatic filariasis .","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic causing suspension of construction projects","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between urban wildlife risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infrastructure challenges","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overwhelmed local governments and
